title: Season 6 Provisionals
body:
Say you were Silver 1 for season 5 and then the preseason started, if you gain ranks in the preseason to say Gold 3, does it increase your chance to get a higher rank after you do your provisionals for season 6 or does your rank stay at Silver 1 for season 6 provisionals? Meaning if I won 10/10 provisionals I would probably get Gold 5 or Silver 1? 

What I'm trying to say is: Do the ranks in the preseason mean anything at all for season 6s chances at a higher rank?

replies.body: yes. if you change your rank in preseason it will effect your placements next season

the best thing you can do to increase your chance of getting a higher placement for next season is to win more games then you lose, get your elo up, i had a losing streak before i sat my provisional's last season, and only lost 1 provisional, still got a less then ideal placement due to the matches i had lost before hand. Gold 4 preseason to Silver 4 after provisional's.
